p: The yield of the essential oil from the Croton limae fresh leaves, calculated from their mass, was 0.36%. In the chemical analysis of the oil, 14 compounds were identified and quantified, representing 84.7% of the total chemical composition. The main compounds were cedrol (28.4%), eucalyptol (17.4%) and Î±-pinene (13.8%). This corresponds to 59.6% of the total composition of the oil. The chemical compounds identified and their respective quantities, retention time and Kovats index (Adams 2001), are summarized in Table 1.
